nodes.text: Attack on the Brak Sector CommNet

In 1 ABY, Rebel forces attacked the Brak sector communications network in a coordinated strike, wiping out Imperial and civilian communications in the sector. While some relay stations and transmitters were attacked by heavily armed freighters, most of them were sabotaged to self-destruct. Nevertheless, most stations reported few casualties. The blackout was widespread but backup systems quickly came online. Heavily populated areas reported few problems but long distance communications were disrupted for several hours and some outlying areas remained isolated for nearly one day.
